node.title: Property developer's art collection sells for $921m, including highest price paid for Pollock
node.alt: A man stands in front of a Jackson Pollock painting and gestures at another man bidding at an auction.
node.description: The art collection belonging to Harry Macklowe and ex-wife Linda Burg goes under the hammer, after a New York judge ordered them to sell it after their divorce and split the profits 50/50.
node.content:
["A Mark Rothko painting has sold for US$82.5 million ($112.4 million) at auction, the second-highest price for a work by the late abstract artist, as part of a $921 million collection belonging to US real estate mogul Harry Macklowe.", "It was the first time the piece titled No. 7 \u2014 a\u00a0241-centimetre-high canvas painted in 1951 in bands of green, crimson and lavender \u2014 had come to auction.\u00a0", "", "
A previous Mark Rothko piece sold for $118 million, just pipping No. 7 for top spot.(AP: Mary Altaffer)
", "The identity of the buyer was not known.", "The record for a Rothko was set in 2012 when \"Orange, red, yellow\" sold for $118 million at Christie's in New York.", "The Rothko work was just one of dozens by leading artists up for auction from the colection\u00a0acquired by Mr Macklowe and then-wife Linda over 45 years.", "A New York judge ordered them to sell the collection and split the proceeds down the middle during their 2018 divorce trial.", "", "
Two Andy Warhol piece \u2014 Nine Marilyns and Sixteen Jackies \u2014 fetched high prices.(AP: Mary Altaffer)
", "Jackson Pollock's Number 17, 1951\u00a0fetched a new record for the abstract US\u00a0artist at $83.4 million, while in its first appearance at auction, Cy Twombly's vast 2007 Untitled\u00a0work of abstract red peonies sold for $80.2 million.", "Other works sold included the 1947 sculpture Le Nez\u00a0by Swiss artist Alberto Giacometti, the world's most expensive sculptor. It fetched $106.8 million.", "Andy Warhol's Nine Marilyns\u00a0silkscreen from 1962, made shortly after Marilyn Monroe's death, went for $66.1 million, while the pop artist's Sixteen Jackies\u00a0tribute to former US\u00a0first lady Jacqueline Kennedy in black, white and blue tones sold for $46.1 million.", "", "
About 40 more pieces from the collection are set to go up for auction in May.(AP: Mary Altaffer)
", "Sotheby's said the 65 works in the Macklowe Collection represent \"an unrivalled ensemble that charts the high points of Western artistic achievement of the last 80 years\".", "The auction was split into two parts, with the remaining 40 or so works of to be sold in May 2022.", "Reuters"]
